House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to provide for the temporary suspension of the duty on mixtures of phenyl methyl pyrazolone and phenyl carbethoxy pyrazolone, acetoacet-o-chloranilide, R Salt, para nitro ortho toluidine and tobias acid, meta nitro-o-anisidine, para chloro-o-nitroaniline, meta nitro para anisidine and para nitro-o-anisidine.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1990, the duty on mixtures of: (1) phenyl methyl pyrazolone and phenyl carbethoxy pyrazolone; (2) acetoacet-o-chloranilide; (3) R salt; (4) para nitro ortho toluidine and tobias acid; (5) meta nitro-o-anisidine; (6) para chloro-o-nitroaniline; and (7) meta nitro para anisidine and para nitro-o-anisidine.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the temporary suspension of the duty on mixtures of phenyl methyl pyrazolone and phenyl carbethoxy pyrazolone, acetoacet-o-chloranilide, R Salt, para nitro ortho toluidine and tobias acid, meta nitro-o-anisidine, para chloro-o-nitroaniline, meta nitro para anisidine and para nitro-o-anisidine.
